data.name: ChildStory Demo
data.detailed_description:
Sonya and Album


A girl is looking for her father's childhood, which was stolen by a night thief while he was sleeping. Will the girl be able to return father's childhood by going through the world of other people's memories, or will she find something more important?



Various Stories

- Become the main character, Sonia, and find out who is the thief of your father's memories. Find him, and take your childhood back.
- Use the tools and objects at hand to navigate your way through a dangerous alien world.
- Make friends with the charming characters in the Album town and eat sweets with them. Who knows, maybe you'll become best friends?

Activities & Explore

- Break the bushes in search of coins to buy candy and cotton candy!
- Explore a mysterious fantasy world. You can find unique areas and you can meet cute creatures there. Interact with various creatures and help them.
- Soon the city will host the festival of Childhood. Become a part of it, plunging into an unforgettable winter atmosphere!

Time is running out

- Every minute the thief's tracks are lost. Sonya must hurry if she doesn't want to lose track of the thief completely.
- In addition, Sonia loses her humanity.
- But at the same time, I want to be a part of the holiday. Sonya will have to choose.

data.short_description: Game about a girl who falls into the world of other people's childhoods.
